row.process:
:SET &UC4RB_SQL_SEPARATOR# = "," :SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = "imp &UC4RB_DB_USERNAME#/&UC4RB_DB_PASSWORD_TMP#"
:IF &UC4RB_DB_SID# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, "@&UC4RB_DB_SID#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_IMP_INVOKE_AS_SYSDBA# = "YES" : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" : IF &UC4RB_DB_SID# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = "imp userid=\'" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#,'&UC4RB_DB_USERNAME#/&UC4RB_DB_PASSWORD_TMP#') : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#,'@&UC4RB_DB_SID# AS SYSDBA') : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#,"\'") : ENDIF : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : IF &UC4RB_DB_SID# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = "imp userid='" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#,'&UC4RB_DB_USERNAME#/&UC4RB_DB_PASSWORD_TMP#') : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#,'@&UC4RB_DB_SID# AS SYSDBA') : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#,"'") : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPMODE_FULL# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " FULL = Y") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPMODE_FROMUSERS# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " FROMUSER = &UC4RB_DB_IMPMODE_FROMUSERS#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPMODE_TOUSERS# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " TOUSER = &UC4RB_DB_IMPMODE_TOUSERS#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPMODE_TABLES# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " TABLES = &UC4RB_DB_IMPMODE_TABLES#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPMODE_TRANSP_TS# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " TRANSPORT_TABLESPACE = Y") : IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPMODE_TS_LIST# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " TABLESPACES = &UC4RB_DB_IMPMODE_TS_LIST#") : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPMODE_TTS_OWNERS# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " TTS_OWNERS = &UC4RB_DB_IMPMODE_TTS_OWNERS#") : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPMODE_DATAFILES# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " DATAFILES = &UC4RB_DB_IMPMODE_DATAFILES#") : ENDIF :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " TRANSPORT_TABLESPACE = N") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_FILES# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " FILE = &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_FILES#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_FILESIZE# <> "" OR "0" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " FILESIZE = &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_FILESIZE#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_VOLSIZE# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " VOLSIZE = &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_VOLSIZE#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_LOGFILE# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " LOG = &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_LOGFILE#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_RECORDLENGTH# <> "" OR "0" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " RECORDLENGTH = &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_RECORDLENGTH#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_ROWS# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " ROWS = Y") :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " ROWS = N") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_COMMIT# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " COMMIT = Y") :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " COMMIT = N") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_BUFFER# <> "0" OR "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " BUFFER = &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_BUFFER#") :ENDIF !:IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_BUFFER# = "YES" !: SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " BUFFER = Y") !:ELSE !: SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " BUFFER = N") !:ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_IGNORE_ERR# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " IGNORE = Y") :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " IGNORE = N") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_DESTROY# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " DESTROY = Y") :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " DESTROY = N") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_CONSTRAINTS# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " CONSTRAINTS = Y") :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " CONSTRAINTS = N") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_STREAMS_CONFIG# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " STREAMS_CONFIGURATION = Y") :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " STREAMS_CONFIGURATION = N") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_STREAMS_INST# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " STREAMS_INSTANTIATION = Y") :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " STREAMS_INSTANTIATION = N") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_GRANTS# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " GRANTS = Y") :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " GRANTS = N") :ENDIF
!:IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_SHOW# = "YES" !: SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " SHOW = Y") !:ELSE !: SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " SHOW = N") !:ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_COMPILE# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " COMPILE = Y") :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " COMPILE = N") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_STATISTICS# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " STATISTICS = &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_STATISTICS#") :ENDIF
!:IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_TOID_NOVALIDATE# <> "" !: SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " TOID_NOVALIDATE = &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_TOID_NOVALIDATE#") !:ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_RESUMABLE# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " RESUMABLE = Y") : IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_RESUMABLE_NAME# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " RESUMABLE_NAME = '&UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_RESUMABLE_NAME#'") : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_RSMBL_TIMEOUT# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " RESUMABLE_TIMEOUT = &UC4RB_DB_IMPOPT_RSMBL_TIMEOUT#") : ENDIF
:ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " RESUMABLE = N") :ENDIF :PRINT &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#
